# Copilot Instructions for tinykite.co

## Project Overview
This is the company website for tinykite.co. The project is currently in early development stages.

## Development Guidelines

### Code Style & Quality
- Follow modern JavaScript/TypeScript best practices
- Ensure code is well-documented with clear comments where necessary
- Write clean, maintainable, and readable code
- Use semantic HTML and accessible markup for web content

### Testing
- When adding new features, include appropriate tests
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting changes
- Follow existing test patterns and conventions in the repository

### Dependencies
- Only add dependencies that are well-maintained and necessary
- Check for security vulnerabilities before adding new packages
- Keep dependencies up to date

### Documentation
- Update documentation when making changes to features or APIs
- Keep README.md current with setup and usage instructions
- Document any configuration changes or new environment variables

### Git Workflow
- Write clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep changes focused and atomic
- Ensure the repository builds and tests pass before committing

## Build & Test Commands
*To be updated as the project evolves*

## Common Tasks
- Review and update dependencies for security vulnerabilities
- Ensure accessibility standards are met
- Optimize for performance and best practices
- Follow responsive design principles for all UI work

## Important Notes
- This is a company website, so maintain professional standards
- Ensure all changes are production-ready
- Consider SEO implications for content and structural changes
